meanings.definition: An aromatic herb used in cooking.
meanings.sent1: I added some dill to the soup for extra flavor.
meanings.sent2: The recipe called for a pinch of dill to be sprinkled on top.
meanings.sent3: The dill danced in the pot, spreading its delightful scent.
meanings.sent4: The dill was a magician, turning a simple dish into a culinary masterpiece.
meanings.sent5: The vibrant green dill leaves brightened up the dish like a burst of sunshine.

meanings.definition: A pickling spice made from the seeds of the dill plant.
meanings.sent1: The pickles had a strong dill flavor that I loved.
meanings.sent2: She added dill to the brine to give the pickles their signature taste.
meanings.sent3: The dill seeds played hide and seek in the jar of pickles.
meanings.sent4: The dill transformed the ordinary cucumbers into tangy delights.
meanings.sent5: The aroma of dill filled the kitchen, promising delicious pickles to come.
